name: Astrocat (IceBatty, Pringlae, Oddsman)
description:
The game Astrocat is about a little guy, who tries to stay alive in problematic spaceship.

Move: W, A, S, D.
Interact: Spacebar 

Tutorial: You need to dont let the bars reach the end in every section with press  big red button by interaction. You can see the whole map in green screen close to spawn, there are icons that you need to fix.

---

Игра была разработана во время участия в гейм джеме Ludum Dare 50 на базе сообщества авторов игр «Индикатор»
